channel.title: Comments on: I Am The Master

item.title: By: Updates, or, How the Stories End | AFK Gamer
item.dc:creator: Updates, or, How the Stories End | AFK Gamer
item.description: [...] Updates, because everyone wants to know how the story ends: Recall the lying “I’m ebaying/IGEing” rogue that left our guild a few weeks back, immediately after the departure of two insurgents who tried to grab lasting guild power and failed. Whatever happened with all of that? Well, the rogue’s application to a rival guild was closed and denied that same day, as I wrote previously, and he eventually landed in a guild that we call, affectionately, the Guild for the Unguildables. Every member is a former member of a raiding guild and has … let’s say, baggage … in other words, a tattered reputation. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Updates, because everyone wants to know how the story ends: Recall the lying “I’m ebaying/IGEing” rogue that left our guild a few weeks back, immediately after the departure of two insurgents who tried to grab lasting guild power and failed. Whatever happened with all of that? Well, the rogue’s application to a rival guild was closed and denied that same day, as I wrote previously, and he eventually landed in a guild that we call, affectionately, the Guild for the Unguildables. Every member is a former member of a raiding guild and has … let’s say, baggage … in other words, a tattered reputation. […]

item.title: By: heather
item.dc:creator: heather
item.description: Wow. Soap operas for geeks. This stuff is awesome. Must go pop some popcorn and read more...
item.content:encoded: Wow. Soap operas for geeks. This stuff is awesome. Must go pop some popcorn and read more…

item.title: By: Evolution is My Friend at AFK Gamer
item.dc:creator: Evolution is My Friend at AFK Gamer
item.description: [...] Now, remember a few weeks ago I told you the story of our own guild rogue that left after posting that he had sold his rogue account and thanks for the memories and the next day the new driver would be taking over? (Here’s the link.) I also told you that he landed in a Guild for the Unguildables after I torched his application to a rival endgame guild. This is the very same Unguildables guild he joined. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Now, remember a few weeks ago I told you the story of our own guild rogue that left after posting that he had sold his rogue account and thanks for the memories and the next day the new driver would be taking over? (Here’s the link.) I also told you that he landed in a Guild for the Unguildables after I torched his application to a rival endgame guild. This is the very same Unguildables guild he joined. […]

item.title: By: Era @ Ravencrest EU
item.dc:creator: Era @ Ravencrest EU
item.content:encoded:
did something similar, though im no “guerilla master” just posted with my own name on my former guilds forum when some fucktards obviously lied about their age and all kinda shit… called my self “Bullshit Policeofficer” … love the rank taking game…

but well “DEATH TO ALL FUCKTARDS”
and I feel with ya… on RC like 90% of the players has switched guild at least 5 times …

item.title: By: Heartless_
item.dc:creator: Heartless_
item.description: Well can't wait to read about when this guild finally implodes. I have yet to meet a raiding guild that has survived more than a few months acting like yours.
item.content:encoded: Well can’t wait to read about when this guild finally implodes. I have yet to meet a raiding guild that has survived more than a few months acting like yours.

item.title: By: DGM
item.dc:creator: DGM
item.description:
The theme from mortal combat comes on, the words 'finish him' echo through your mind, what do you do?
You pull the king of all combos and take that sucker down, nice work Foton. =D
item.content:encoded:
The theme from mortal combat comes on, the words ‘finish him’ echo through your mind, what do you do?

You pull the king of all combos and take that sucker down, nice work Foton. =D

item.title: By: henryvi
item.dc:creator: henryvi
item.description: /bow That was fantastic man, a nice little reminder of when I was in my 30's and my guild (which a 60 had wiggled me into despite it being an endgame raid guild) was undergoing a loooot of bullshit. Fond memories, nice read.
item.content:encoded:
/bow
That was fantastic man, a nice little reminder of when I was in my 30’s and my guild (which a 60 had wiggled me into despite it being an endgame raid guild) was undergoing a loooot of bullshit. Fond memories, nice read.

item.title: By: Dominik Gabler
item.dc:creator: Dominik Gabler
item.description:
one comment from me, on my server it is actually pretty common for some of the "top" people to sell their characters once they quit. Prices have been as high as 2k$ (though that was a full tier 2 warrior with TF back in the day when only about 40 guilds cleared bwl worldwide).
While i would never recruit someone who has bought an account i have never had hard feelings for those who sold and will gladly take them again in whatever game we play next.
item.content:encoded:
one comment from me, on my server it is actually pretty common for some of the “top” people to sell their characters once they quit.
Prices have been as high as 2k$ (though that was a full tier 2 warrior with TF back in the day when only about 40 guilds cleared bwl worldwide).

While i would never recruit someone who has bought an account i have never had hard feelings for those who sold and will gladly take them again in whatever game we play next.

item.title: By: Deth
item.dc:creator: Deth
item.description: *bows to the sensei* loved the story. Is it wrong that i hope your guild falls apart because it would be a great story? =) jk.
item.content:encoded: *bows to the sensei* loved the story. Is it wrong that i hope your guild falls apart because it would be a great story? =) jk.
